org.universAAL.middleware.modules

Interface SpaceModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Module
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpaceModuleImpl

    public interface SpaceModule
extends Module
    The implementations of this interface manage the Space life-cycle: creation, update, destroy.
    Author:
    Michele Girolami

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPeer(SpaceDescriptor spaceDescriptor, PeerCard peer)
      This method allows to add a new Peer to the Space.
      void announceNewPeer(SpaceCard spaceCard, PeerCard peerCard)
      This method propagates the event of new PeerAdded to the whole Space
      void configureSpaceChannel()
      This method configures the channel used in order to send/receive Space messages
      void destroySpace(SpaceCard spaceCard)
      Destroy a Space
      List<String> getPeersAddress()
      This method fetches the list of peer address joining to the same Space
      List<SpaceCard> getSpaces()
      This method fetches a list of Spaces without any filter
      List<SpaceCard> getSpaces(Dictionary<String,String> filters)
      This method fetches a list of Spaces according to a filter
      void joinSpace(PeerCard spaceCoordinator, SpaceCard spaceCard)
      This method allows to join to an existing Space
      void leaveSpace(PeerCard spaceCoordinator, SpaceCard spaceCard)
      This method allows to leave a Space
      void messageFromSpace(SpaceMessage message, PeerCard sender)
      This method is called as soon as an SpaceMessage has been received
      void newSpace(SpaceCard spaceCard)
      This method creates a new Space
      void renewSpace(SpaceCard spaceCard)
      This method renews the Space
      void requestPeerCard(SpaceDescriptor spaceDescriptor, String peerAddress)
      This method allows to send a request for the PeerCard of the peer with the specified address
      void requestToLeave(SpaceDescriptor spaceDescriptor)
      This method announces to all the peers to leave the space

      • joinSpace

        void joinSpace(PeerCard spaceCoordinator,
               SpaceCard spaceCard)
        This method allows to join to an existing Space
        Parameters:
        spaceCoordinator - The PeerCard of the Space coordinator to which to sent the request
        spaceCard - The SpaceCard of the space the peer aims to join

                SpaceCard spaceCard)
        This method allows to leave a Space
        Parameters:
        spaceCard - Space Card of the Space to leave

        void requestToLeave(SpaceDescriptor spaceDescriptor)
        This method announces to all the peers to leave the space

        spaceDescriptor -

      • requestPeerCard

        void requestPeerCard(SpaceDescriptor spaceDescriptor,
                     String peerAddress)
        This method allows to send a request for the PeerCard of the peer with the specified address
        Parameters:
        peerAddress - the address of the peer
        spaceDescriptor - the Space descriptor

      • addPeer

        void addPeer(SpaceDescriptor spaceDescriptor,
             PeerCard peer)
        This method allows to add a new Peer to the Space.
        Parameters:
        spaceDescriptor - All the information regarding the Space for the new Peer
        peer - The Peer to add to the Space

      • announceNewPeer

        void announceNewPeer(SpaceCard spaceCard,
                     PeerCard peerCard)
        This method propagates the event of new PeerAdded to the whole Space
        Parameters:
        spaceCard - The Space where to propagate the event
        peerCard - The new peer added

        void configureSpaceChannel()
        This method configures the channel used in order to send/receive Space messages
